name: Captain America
bio: Vowing to serve his country any way he could, young Steve Rogers took the super soldier serum to become America's one-man army. Fighting for the red, white and blue for over 60 years, Captain America is the living, breathing symbol of freedom and liberty.
powers: In Captain America, strength, speed, durability, agility, reflexes, senses, and mental processing are at the very peak of human capability. He is a master martial artist and hand-to-hand combatant. And of course, The Cap never goes anywhere without his red, white and blue vibranium-steel alloy shield.
